channel.title: Softlayer_container_network_contentdelivery_authentication_serviceendpoint on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_container_network_contentdelivery_authentication_serviceendpoint on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_ServiceEndpoint
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_Authentication_ServiceEndpoint Datatype Description CDN supports the content authentication service. With the content authentication service, customers can control access to their contents. There are several scenarios where this authentication capability could be useful. Websites can prevent other rogue websites from linking to their videos. Content owners can prevent users from passing around http links, thus forcing them to login to view contents. It is also possible to authenticate via the client IP address.
